name: Emma
text: First off, the seller and shipping were both fast and wonderful...the printer itself is junk. I got it all set-up and was ready to go. The first thing that I tried to print came out in bright blue.

name: Charlotte
text: Set this up when it arrived and have been printing from my computer and phone ever since. So easy for my 75 year old self to set up and use. Quality is great and it didn't cost a fortune.

name: Robert
text: I have a GTX 1060 laptop, set up is easy and there was no need for me to calibrate anything, I even dare say this monitor looks better than my own laptop screen at 1080p.

name: Jennifer
text: The designer of this product made something really wonderful. There's tiny attention to detail in materials choices, packaging. Some artistic, some functional.

name: Mary
text: easy to set up and use. Love that you dont have to pair when someone wants to use it and can instead just email the printer and it will automatically print! So cool!

name: John
text: Just got two of these bad boys. pulled them out of the box added the thread extenders put them on my monitor tree. Set up was easy, resolution is perfect for my needs (Business). Did some initial setup with adjusting the view area of the screen but the auto adjustment made that very simple.
